modName: George the Dwarven Centurion Follower - DELETED
summary:
WIP
Adds an dwarven centurion follower to the game.
descriptionHtml:
This is a WORK IN PROGRESS! I do not know how to give dwarven centurions the ability to follow, and it may be a while untill I learn how. 

George is a level 40 Dwarven Centurion who can be found in the Dragonsreach in Whiterun. He was specially programmed to act as the dragonborns bodyguard. He has been programmed with the voice of a nord so he can communicate with the dragonborn. 

[font=Arial, Helvetica, Verdana, sans-serif]George has been downsized to 75% of his default hight, but can be further downsized by typing into the console "setscale 0.50".  You will have to use [/font]the follow/dissmis spell on geroge and he'll follow.

Issues/Bugs: 
[font=Arial, Helvetica, Verdana, sans-serif]As of yet, he can't actually follow, but I am working on it. You can't speak to him, so right now he is just decoration. [/font]

Compatible/Incompatible: 
Must be placed after Ultimate Follower Overhaul.
author: DireWolf12345
